diff_hunk:
@@ -14,54 +16,70 @@ set LDFLAGS=/LIBPATH:%INSTALL_DIR%/lib
 set CWRAP_FILES=%BASE_DIR%/torch/lib/ATen/Declarations.cwrap;%BASE_DIR%/torch/lib/ATen/Local.cwrap;%BASE_DIR%/torch/lib/THNN/generic/THNN.h;%BASE_DIR%/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/THCUNN.h;%BASE_DIR%/torch/lib/ATen/nn.yaml
 set C_FLAGS=%BASIC_C_FLAGS% /D_WIN32 /Z7 /EHa /DNOMINMAX
 set LINK_FLAGS=/DEBUG:FULL
+: End cmake variables
+
+if not exist torch\lib\tmp_install mkdir torch\lib\tmp_install
+
+: Variable defaults
+set /a USE_CUDA=0
+set /a USE_ROCM=0
+set /a USE_NNPACK=0
+set /a USE_QNNPACK=0
+set /a USE_GLOO_IBVERBS=0
+
+set /a NO_NNPACK=1
+set /a NO_MKLDNN=1
body:
Some crossing of paths on code here with https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/12170/

You'll want to change this to USE_MKLDNN. Any chance we can use something like `$((1-$USE_NNPACK))` on Windows to set NO_NNPACK below directly rather than having two batch script variables?
body_html:
